Modules List

Here is a list of all modules with brief descriptions:
ssht_core_modFunctionality to perform spin spherical harmonic transforms on the sphere
ssht_dl_modFunctionality to compute specified plane of the Wigner dl matrix
ssht_error_modFunctionality to handle errors that may occur in the ssht library. Public ssht error codes are defined, with corresponding private error comments and default halt execution status
ssht_sampling_modFunctionality to define sample positions for various algorithms, to compute weights and to convert 1D and 2D harmonic indices
ssht_types_modDefinition of intrinsic types and constants used in the ssht library
